metadata.title: FNMOC Six-Hourly and Monthly Mean Sea Level Pressure

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Southwest Fisheries Science Center (SFSC), Pacific Fisheries Environmental Laboratory (PFEL)

metadata.description:
PFEL monthly mean sea level pressure maps based on the FNMOC 360x181 (1-degree) analyzed fields.

Download or plot the data from the PFEL Live Access Server (LAS) (http://www.pfeg.noaa.gov/products/las.html)
URL -- ( http://www.pfeg.noaa.gov/products/PFEL/modeled/pressure_maps/pressure_maps.html )

( A TCODE project )   

[ Reference: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 2001, Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific", http://www.pices.int/publications/scientific_reports/Report18/default.aspx. ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide model derived data products which will assist in describing the variability in the ocean environment.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Other

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Check with Contributor.
